Control Name: Facility Access Controls  Maintain Maintenance Records - 164.310(a)(2)(iv)
Control Statement: Implement policies and procedures to document repairs and modifications to the physical components of a facility which are related to security (As one illustrative example, hardware, walls, doors, and locks).
